original_text:
“‘Let the sword return to its sheath.
    In the place where you were created,
in the land of your ancestry,
    I will judge you.
korean_text: 그러나 칼을 그 칼집에 꽂을지어다 네가 지음을 받은 곳에서, 네가 출생한 땅에서 내가 너를 심판하리로다

sentences.original_text: Let the sword return to its sheath
In the place where you were created
in the land of your ancestry
